mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECTURE ( L_NO , L_TITLE , L_THUMBNAIL , L_ENROLL_DATE , L_MODIFY_DATE , L_STATUS , LC_NO , LT_NO , L_CONTENT ) VALUES ( 12 , #{lTitle} , #{lThumbnail} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , #{lcNo} , #{ltNo} , #{lContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LECTURE WHERE L_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT L_NO , L_TITLE , L_THUMBNAIL , LC_NAME , LT_NAME , L_CONTENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, L.* FROM(SELECT * FROM LECTURE O JOIN LECTURE_CLASSIFICATION C1 ON(O.LC_NO = C1.LC_NO) JOIN LECTURE_TARGET C2 ON(O.LT_NO = C2.LT_NO) WHERE L_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY L_NO DESC) L ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT L_NO , L_TITLE , L_THUMBNAIL , LC_NO , LT_NO , L_CONTENT FROM LECTURE WHERE L_NO=#{lNo}
SELECT L_NO , L_TITLE , L_THUMBNAIL FROM LECTURE WHERE L_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY L_NO DESC

SELECT INSTRUCTOR_NO , INSTRUCTOR_NAME , PROFILE_PHOTO , BIRTH_DATE , INSTRUCTOR_PHONE , CAREER FROM INSTRUCTOR WHERE INSTRUCTOR_NO NOT IN(SELECT INSTRUCTOR_NO FROM LECTURE_REGISTRATION WHERE (TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN LR_START_DATE AND LR_END_DATE OR TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN LR_START_DATE AND LR_END_DATE) AND #{day} = LR_DAY AND (#{startTime} BETWEEN LR_START_TIME AND LR_END_TIME OR #{endTime} BETWEEN LR_START_TIME AND LR_END_TIME))
